Description: After Netanyahu failed to form a coalition by the May 4 deadline (28 days from April 6)
URL: President Reuven Rivlin tasked Yair Lapid of Yesh Atid with forming the next government. Lapid had the backing of 56 Knesset members from seven factions.

Event: Hamas and PIJ Launch Rocket Attacks on Israel
Description: Following Israeli police crackdown on Palestinians at Al-Aqsa Mosque compound on May 10 and ongoing tensions over Sheikh Jarrah evictions. Hamas and Palestinian Islamic Jihad began launching thousands of rockets at Israel. Over 11 days 4
URL: 360+ rockets were fired at Israeli targets.

Description: After 11 days of intense fighting resulting in at least 256 Palestinians and 13 Israelis killed. Egypt mediated a ceasefire between Israel and Hamas that came into effect on May 21. Both sides claimed victory and the ceasefire held.
